arts.ttl: Debutant sub Kevin inspires Fulham to last-gasp Leeds win
arts.sum: Late debutant Kevin inspired a previously insipid Fulham performance to a last-gasp victory as Gabriel Gudmundsson's own goal gave the Cottagers a 1-0 win over Leeds.

arts.ttl: Shocking revelation as Leeds United made huge error before Fulham game
arts.sum: Leeds United once again found out how difficult it is to get a result in the Premier League. Daniel Farke’s side came up short away from home to a difficult Fulham side. The game was in the balance for most of the 90 minutes. arts.ttl: Fulham’s club-record signing impresses in late win over Leeds
arts.sum: Fulham 1-0 Leeds: Kevin impressed on his cameo but Gabriel Gudmundsson’s 94th-minute own goal proved the difference as the hosts earned their first win of the season

arts.ttl: Last-gasp Gabriel Gudmundsson own goal gives Fulham victory over Leeds
arts.sum: A quiet match burst into life when Fulham debutant Kevin forced a stoppage-time save, leading to Gudmundsson’s own goal. Leeds's London misery continues with 9 consecutive defeats.

arts.ttl: Premier League LIVE: Follow the packed Saturday schedule
arts.sum:
Live updates from around the grounds following Arsenal's early kick-off win over Forest.
Everton, Villa, Leeds and Newcastle among the teams in action.

arts.ttl: Daniel Farke makes shock change to Leeds United lineup vs Fulham
arts.sum: Leeds United are away to Fulham in their first league game after the international break. Marco Silva’s side will definitely be a tough opponent for the Whites on Saturday. Leeds away form has been very poor this season, the club has failed to win a single game on the road. A 5-0 loss to Arsenal […] The post Daniel Farke makes shock change to Leeds United lineup vs Fulham appeared first on The Leeds Press.

arts.ttl: Marco Silva speaks about his squad strength before the battle with Leeds United
arts.sum: “We believe the profiles of Samuel Chukwueze and Kevin will add what we’ve been looking for in those areas of the pitch.” The manager discussed three arrivals from the start of the month on deadline day, two of whom are options in an area of the pitch that was crying out for depth.

arts.ttl: Marco Silva sees a ‘winning mentality and good vibes’ from Leeds United camp
arts.sum: When you are in the Championship and you win promotion, that winning mentality and good vibes when you are winning games, if you can keep that going into the Premier League season, it’s very important. But Marco Silva is not sleeping on Leeds United, whose "winning mentality and good vibes" from last year remain intact.

arts.ttl: Daniel Farke set to unleash Leeds United star that 'ticks every box' v Fulham - Opinion
arts.sum: Leeds United’s trip down to Fulham this afternoon sees Joel Piroe and Lukas Nmecha as injury doubts, paving the way for Dominic Calvert-Lewin to start for the first time. When Farke spoke to the press on Thursday, he was eager to put a disappointed end to the summer window behind him. arts.ttl: Fulham vs Leeds United – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Fulham’s search for a first Premier League win of the season continues on Saturday when they host a Leeds United side contending with a significant injury crisis. The fixture at Craven Cottage, which has a history of producing plenty of goals, presents a clash of needs.
